name: Plants Beta
description:
Relax, sit in a chair, make tea (or coffee) and immerse yourself in a wonderful game called "Plants"!

And so, at the very beginning we have an island of 4 * 4 blocks and 25 coins, what should we do? First, let's clear a place to plant the plants.

Move the mouse cursor over the area you want to clear and click

Wonderful! We've cleared the area!

Now we need to plant the seeds

Be careful! Cleared land is overgrown after 15 seconds

In the lower right corner you see a bag of seeds

Drag it to the landing site and release!

You will see how the seeds are poured into the garden, in a second you will have seeds!

Plants have 4 stages of growth, each one changes after 15 seconds, but we do not want to wait long, so we take a watering can and pour it on the plant to move on to the next stage

This stage is the last one, sell it by clicking on it and get the well-deserved coins

If your budget exceeds 50 coins, then you can buy a new plot by clicking on it

Congratulations, you are now trained! We wish you success in the game, do not forget to follow the updates that will be released frequently, because the game is still in development
